Package com.zebra.barcode.sdk

package com.zebra.barcode.sdk
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.zebra.barcode.sdk.sms
     
  • Class
    Description
    AuxiliaryDeviceStatusEventArgs
    Represents information related to the auxiliary scanner status change(add, remove) event.
    AuxiliaryDeviceStatusEventArgs.DeviceStatus
    Device status
    AuxiliaryScannerStatusChangeListener
    Should implement this interface in order to receive auxiliary scanner status change (added and removed) events.
    BarcodeDataEventArgs
    Represents information related to the barcode data event.
    BarcodeDataEventArgs.BarcodeType
    Barcode types
    BarcodeDataListener
    Should implement this interface in order to receive barcode data events.
    BarcodeScanner
    Should implement this interface in order to access scanner specific methods and events.
    BarcodeScannerFactory
    Factory class for creating BarcodeScanner objects
    BarcodeScannerInfo
    Responsible for the definitions of scanner's information which includes name, hardware and Status.
    BarcodeScannerManagementServicesFactory
    Factory class for creating barcode scanner management service
    BarcodeScannerManager
    Responsible for scanner management services including enumerating, updating firmware, rebooting.
    BarcodeScannerSdk
    Represents factory properties of barcode scanner management service, barcode scanner watcher service and barcode scanner.
    BarcodeScannerType
     
    BarcodeScannerWatcher
    Responsible for Watching changes taking place in barcode scanner the host can see and raises appropriate events notifying clients regarding the change.
    BarcodeScannerWatcherEventsListener
    Should implement this interface in order to receive scanner status change (appeared, disappeared, connected and disconnected) events.
    BarcodeScannerWatcherServicesFactory
    Factory class for creating scanner watchers
    BinaryDataEventArgs
    Represents information related to the binary data event.
    BinaryDataListener
    Should implement this interface in order to receive binary data events.
    BluetoothLeScannerInfo
    Responsible for the definitions of Bluetooth LE barcode scanner's information which includes name, hardware and Status.
    BluetoothScannerInfo
    Responsible for the definitions of Bluetooth barcode scanner's information which includes name, hardware and Status.
    ContextAddress
    Represent context address of the scanner in a scanner tree
    FirmwareUpdateData
    Represent Firmware update data
    FirmwareUpdateData.FirmwareUpdateEventType
    Firmware update event type
    FirmwareUpdateData.Status
    These constants are defined to represent result codes that can be returned by SDK API functions.
    FirmwareUpdateEventArgs
    Represents information related to the firmware update event.
    FirmwareUpdateEventListener
    Should implement this interface in order to receive firmware update events.
    ImageEventArgs
    Represents information related to the image event.
    ImageListener
    Should implement this interface in order to receive image events.
    LegacySdkEventHandler
    Implementing the IDcsSdkApiDelegate class to receive Legacy Scanner SDK events and transform them into Barcode Scanner listeners.
    ScannerAppearedEventArgs
    Represents information related to the scanner appeared event took place on the barcode scanner.
    ScannerConnectedEventArgs
    Represents information related to the scanner connected event took place on the barcode scanner.
    ScannerDisappearedEventArgs
    Represents information related to the scanner disappeared event took place on the barcode scanner.
    ScannerDisconnectedEventArgs
    Represents information related to the scanner disconnected event took place on the barcode scanner.
    ScannerInfo
    Responsible for the definitions of barcode scanner's information which includes name, hardware and Status.
    UsbScannerInfo
    Responsible for the definitions of Snapi barcode scanner's information which includes name, hardware and Status.
    VideoEventArgs
    Represents information related to the video event.
    VideoListener
    Should implement this interface in order to receive video events.
    ZebraBarcodeScanner
    Represent a Zebra barcode scanner
    ZebraBarcodeScannerWatcher
    Watcher for Zebra barcode scanners which watches for scanner connection changes.
    ZebraScannerManager
    Responsible for managing Zebra devices
